StewardIntro: The steward is at your service! The only problem is that all the mattresses have been taken away to be cleaned of bedbugs, so there is nothing to sleep on.
StewardMattress: If you come across a mattress in your adventures, don't hesitate to bring it.
StewardPlace: Oh Lord, what kind of pile did you dig that up from? ^ It's still better than nothing, i guess, but it's impossible to sleep on it without an air freshener!
StewardTip: If I were you, I'd stock up on air fresheners.
